sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The trial was approved by the institutional review boards of each participating institution (Nagoya Medical Center, Hokkaido University Hospital, St. Marianna University School of Medicine and Kyushu University Hospital).
Written informed consent is obtained from every patient prior to participation in the trial.
